plan_context.query: Write a short note on how fast quantum computers currently are. It should be one paragraph and in the style of lecture notes.and write it onto a notion page called quantum

steps.task: Compose a short note on how fast quantum computers currently are in one paragraph and in the style of lecture notes.
Using the note content from $quantum_note, create a new Notion page called 'quantum' and write the composed note onto it.

inputs.name: $quantum_note
inputs.description: The note on how fast quantum computers currently are in one paragraph and in the style of lecture notes
